title: Rahu Transit in the 10th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 10th house for Sagittarius ascendant amplifies ambition, visibility, and hunger for professional recognition. Career moves may accelerate through unconventional paths, technology, or foreign-linked roles. Public image becomes highly sensitive; shortcuts can backfire if ethics are compromised. Authority dynamics feel intense, demanding strategic patience. Sustainable success comes by aligning ambition with accountability, verifying promises, and building credibility through consistent performance.
closing: This transit accelerates career ambition and visibility. Ethical discipline and steady execution convert momentum into lasting authority.
